content:
Sure, here is a blank character sheet for "Chronicles of Everia":

Name: \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ Race: \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ Class: \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

Attributes:
Strength: \_\_\_\_ Dexterity: \_\_\_\_ Constitution: \_\_\_\_ Intelligence: \_\_\_\_ Wisdom: \_\_\_\_ Charisma: \_\_\_\_

Skills:
Strength:

* Athletics (Str)
* Intimidation (Cha)

Dexterity:

* Acrobatics (Dex)
* Sleight of Hand (Dex)
* Stealth (Dex)

Constitution:

* Endurance (Con)

Intelligence:

* Arcana (Int)
* History (Int)
* Investigation (Int)
* Nature (Int)
* Religion (Int)

Wisdom:

* Animal Handling (Wis)
* Insight (Wis)
* Medicine (Wis)
* Perception (Wis)
* Survival (Wis)

Charisma:

* Deception (Cha)
* Performance (Cha)
* Persuasion (Cha)

Notes:

* To fill in the character sheet, roll 3d10 six times and assign each result to a different attribute.
* For skills, indicate the corresponding attribute in parentheses.
* Choose a race and class to determine additional bonuses and abilities.
